author: rhuijben
msg: (open_root): Prefer detailed error messages when available for the pre-v2
code path, like we handle it for v2 commits.
(abort_edit): Handle errors locally to allow ignoring a few status codes,
(handle_lock): Remove duplicated status handling code. The standard ra_serf
(svn_ra_serf__error_on_status): Add specialized message for http status 500
and remove stray newline from error message for unexpected error status.

author: rhuijben
msg: Give the error message we use for composing multiple error chains a specific
number to allow api users to separate the message chains.
(svn_error_root_cause): Add commented code to explain the problem with

author: hibou
msg: Add predefined Ant target rather than special command line arguments
